page.title: 09HOME LIFE
page.content: We sent out questionnaires to find out how large families were in Carterknowle area.3% had 2 children, 13% had 3, 44% had 4, 26% had 5, 13% had 6 and 3% had 7. Most people had gas fires. Electricity and gas are essential power sources. On the survey most houses have 6 rooms plus a bathroom. Most people have lived in the area for 10 to 15 years and only a few have been here for less than 1 year. {CHILDREN'S POCKET MONEY Pocket Money is that which is given to children by their families every week. {SPENDING MONEY HOW IT WAS SPENT Under 25p 18 Hobbies 163 Gifts 15 25p - Â£2 150 Savings 99 Toys 137 Â£2 - Â£4 24 Clothes 37 Food 120 over Â£4 8
